Nightshift speeds up the ramp on his wheels and then back to robot mode onc=
e he's aboard the ship.  

" Works for me, I save gas and my tires.  Last t=
ime I got stuck and I'm not go'n through that scrap again. "   

Perpetuall=
y on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 31, 2011, at 6:05 AM, Super Cyc=
lonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift sighs =
and transforms into his SUV form.
> >
> > " You're right, who knows? He mig=
ht just welcome a hand after all. Ready
> > ta roll when you guys are. Slag=
 I sure hope I'm right."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> There was a nod from POLAR CLAW, "=
Wheels up in two of this planet's
> minutes." He said as he walked up the r=
amp into the shuttle. "We got a
> mision to perform!" He stowed his PADD in=
 subspace as he walked, his
> large frame and cadance making him look very =
bit the soldier.
> 
> PROWL nodded as well, "You vehicular mode will most l=
ikely not be
> needed at this juncture." He said as he turned to walk up th=
e ramp.
> "But if things go sour, your brother may beed you."
> 
> (TAG)
> =

> Preston
